desc.p: Currency of the Lending contract according to which escrow processing actions are determined. This field is associated with SURP.THRESHOLD.AMT, SURPLUS.OPTION, SHORTAGE.OPTION and TEST.ANALYSIS.PERIOD
Must be a valid record in CURRENCY

Escrow threshold amount for an arrangement contract, used to determine the action to be performed by the system when Escrow balance breaches the threshold amount for the given CURRENCY. Input is this field is required only if Escrow processing feature is used. This field is associated with CURRENCY, SURPLUS.OPTION, SHORTAGE.OPTION and TEST.ANALYSIS.PERIOD
1-16 type AMT (standard amount format) characters plus a decimal point.

Determines the action to be performed by the system when Escrow balance breaches the threshold amount mentioned in SURP.THRESHOLD.AMT and CURRENCY. Input is this field is required only if Escrow processing feature is used. This field is associated with CURRENCY, SURP.THRESHOLD.AMT, SHORTAGE.OPTION and TEST.ANALYSIS.PERIOD
Reduce Escrow payment - The excess escrow balance beyond SURP.THRESHOLD.AMT held in ESCROWBAL balance type of the loan contract will be adjusted along with the future escrow instalments

Refund to customer - The excess escrow balance beyond SURP.THRESHOLD.AMT held in ESCROWBAL balance type of the loan contract will be refunded/credited to the customer account defined in SETTLEMENT property class of the arrangement

Determines the action to be performed by the system when Escrow balance is short of cushion amount requried for disbursement to escrow payee(s). This field is associated with CURRENCY, SURP.THRESHOLD.AMT, SURPLUS.OPTION and TEST.ANALYSIS.PERIOD
Ignore shortage - Do nothing, ignore the shortage.
Request payment in 30 days - The shortage escrow amount will be included as part of the arrangement payment schedule to issue a bill for the customer to make the payment.
Add to Escrow - The shortage escrow amount in ESCROWBAL balance type of the loan contract will be with the upcoming escrow instalments
Stores the period before the next scheduled analysis is being performed. This field is associated with CURRENCY, SURP.THRESHOLD.AMT, SURPLUS.OPTION and SHORTAGE.OPTION
Should be of a valid PERIOD type. For example, 30D where D - Days or 1M where M - Month etc.
